page.title: 17RECREATION LEISURE IN LCING
page.content: We carried out a survey on leisure and recreation in four classes acoss the age groups in our shcool.Both adults and children were asked to send returns.After one week we carried out an analysis of the replies.We gained a certain amount of information about the activitys that people do in their spare time.We found the most popular activity was watching television for adults and children.The least popular was volleyball for children and adults.Our survey included spectator sports as well,for adults snooker was the most popular,football was the most popular for children.The most unusual leisure activity was subaqua diving , this is where you swim underwater with a mask,aqualung and flippers. Compiled by Matthew Gent,Darren Payne Richard Waldeck and Adrian Ryan from IRENE AVENUE COUNTY MIDDLE SCHOOL.
